column3: NACK - we only change copyright dates when files are actually changed. Formatting will be taken care of when we sort out clang-formatting.\n
I see, also, what does "NACK" mean?\n
It means I disagree with the changes. See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#pull-request-terminology\n
NACK\nNot useful change. Please close this issue.\n

Thanks for trying to contribute, but we don't update the years randomly, there's a script for it (see contrib/devtools/fix-copyright-headers.py). But the consensus was, last time, to remove the copyright years completely from source files. \n
